abstract: needham & company llc increases ipg photonics price target to $ 280.00 .
article: ipg photonics had its target price boosted by stock analysts at needham & company llc from $ 230.00 to $ 280.00 in a research note issued to investors on wednesday . the brokerage currently has a `` buy '' rating on the semiconductor company 's stock . needham & company llc 's price target points to a potential upside of 6.33 % from the company 's previous close . several other research firms have also weighed in on ipgp . da davidson reiterated a `` buy '' rating and set a $ 220.00 target price on shares of ipg photonics in a report on tuesday , october 10th .

benchmark reiterated a `` buy '' rating and set a $ 230.00 target price on shares of ipg photonics in a report on wednesday , november 1st . bidaskclub raised ipg photonics from a `` buy '' rating to a `` strong-buy '' rating in a research note on friday , january 5th . zacks investment research raised ipg photonics from a `` hold '' rating to a `` strong-buy '' rating and set a $ 240.00 price target on the stock in a research note on friday , october 27th . finally , valuengine downgraded ipg photonics from a `` buy '' rating to a `` hold '' rating in a research note on monday , october 2nd .

five analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating , six have given a buy rating and one has issued a strong buy rating to the company . the stock presently has a consensus rating of `` buy '' and a consensus target price of $ 185.89 . ipg photonics opened at $ 263.34 on wednesday . the company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.02 , a quick ratio of 7.46 and a current ratio of 9.02 . the firm has a market capitalization of $ 14,170.00 , a pe ratio of 38.73 , a price-to-earnings-growth ratio of 2.85 and a beta of 1.71 .

ipg photonics has a twelve month low of $ 102.11 and a twelve month high of $ 264.11 . ipg photonics last posted its earnings results on tuesday , october 31st . the semiconductor company reported $ 2.11 earnings per share for the quarter , topping the thomson reuters ' consensus estimate of $ 1.79 by $ 0.32 . the firm had revenue of $ 392.62 million for the quarter , compared to analyst estimates of $ 367.27 million . ipg photonics had a return on equity of 21.17 % and a net margin of 27.85 % . the company 's revenue for the quarter was up 47.6 % on a year-over-year basis .

during the same period in the previous year , the company posted $ 1.29 earnings per share . equities analysts predict that ipg photonics will post 7.13 eps for the current year . in other ipg photonics news , cfo timothy pv mammen sold 2,500 shares of the business 's stock in a transaction that occurred on friday , january 19th . the stock was sold at an average price of $ 261.53 , for a total transaction of $ 653,825.00 . following the transaction , the chief financial officer now owns 33,600 shares of the company 's stock , valued at $ 8,787,408 .

the sale was disclosed in a document filed with the sec , which is available through this link . also , svp trevor ness sold 10,000 shares of the business 's stock in a transaction that occurred on monday , december 4th . the stock was sold at an average price of $ 208.17 , for a total value of $ 2,081,700.00 . following the transaction , the senior vice president now directly owns 22,906 shares in the company , valued at approximately $ 4,768,342.02 . the disclosure for this sale can be found here . in the last ninety days , insiders sold 44,500 shares of company stock worth $ 10,717,320 .

33.80 % of the stock is owned by company insiders . a number of hedge funds and other institutional investors have recently made changes to their positions in ipgp . strs ohio acquired a new position in ipg photonics during the fourth quarter worth approximately $ 101,000 . livforsakringsbolaget skandia omsesidigt acquired a new position in ipg photonics during the fourth quarter worth approximately $ 128,000 . advantage investment management llc increased its position in ipg photonics by 366.5 % during the third quarter . advantage investment management llc now owns 933 shares of the semiconductor company 's stock worth $ 173,000 after buying an additional 733 shares during the last quarter .

elefante mark b acquired a new position in ipg photonics during the third quarter worth approximately $ 201,000 . finally , fulton bank n. a. acquired a new position in ipg photonics during the third quarter worth approximately $ 202,000 . 56.49 % of the stock is currently owned by hedge funds and other institutional investors . copyright violation notice : this piece of content was originally posted by daily political and is the sole property of of daily political . if you are reading this piece of content on another domain , it was stolen and republished in violation of united states & international trademark & copyright law .

the legal version of this piece of content can be read at photonics company profileipg photonics corporation is a developer and manufacturer of a line of fiber lasers , fiber amplifiers , diode lasers , laser systems and optical accessories that are used for various applications . the company offers a line of lasers and amplifiers , which are used in materials processing , communications and medical applications .
